attributes.action: Change the rules to allow members to call out lying in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details: Members of Parliament should not be punished for calling out lies.
attributes.background: The rules should be reviewed and changed to allow members of Parliament to call out other members for lying without fear of being removed from the chamber.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593112
